text: Sanctus Siluester cwæð: Ne sceal nanacolitus, þæt is huslþen, forsecgan nanne subdiacon; ne nanexorcista, þæt is halsere, forsecgan nanneacolitum; ne nan duruwerd nanne rædere; mid nanre wrohte.

And nelle we na þæt man gewægnige subdiacon ne huslþen ne halsere ne duruwerd ne rædere, þeah hi bearn habbon and wif, and Cristes æ rihtlice bodigan, butan eallswa seo gerynlice soþfæstnys cwyð mid VII tungon.
And ne mæg man nanne diacon gewægnigan butan syx and þrittiga sum and mæssepreost feower and feowertiga sum.
